name: SearchStripeInvoices
description:
Search for previously created Stripe invoices.

This tool searches for invoices you've previously created using Stripe's Search Query Language. It should not be used in read-after-write flows needing strict consistency. Data is typically searchable within a minute but could take up to an hour during outages. Not available for merchants in India.

parameters.name: search_query_string
parameters.description: The search query string using Stripe's Search Query Language. Refer to Stripe's documentation for syntax and supported fields.

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for invoices](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-invoices).

parameters.name: fields_to_expand
parameters.description: A list of fields in the response to be expanded for additional details. Provide field names as strings.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: result_limit
parameters.description: Defines the maximum number of invoice records to return, ranging from 1 to 100. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve subsequent pages. Use the next_page value from a previous response; exclude for the first call.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for invoices](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-invoices).

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for invoices](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-invoices).
